channel.title: Pages on Xangelo.ca
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Xangelo.ca

item.title: Links
item.description: Here’s a collection of blogs (normally run by a single person) that I enjoy and try and keep up with. They aren’t being listed in any particular order. I’m not interested in posting sites that avoid points for links (hn, reddit, lobsters, etc.) - I’m really looking to re-live the nostaliga of early webrings. Drew Devaults Blog - https://drewdevault.com/ Drew’s blog has been something I’ve long followed. He’s the guy behind SourceHut which has quickly become my favourite spot to host projects.

item.title: About
item.description: I’m Angelo. I’ve been working in Software Development for the last 20 years or so, doing a bit of everything. I started my journey as a “Full Stack” developer/designer back when 2Advanced Studios launched v3 and over the years I’ve moved further and further “backward” in the stack. Since about 2012 my technical focus has been around Backend/DevOps/SRE work and more broadly around “Leveling Up Engineering”. I have a history of joining teams that are ready to take the next step from “We have this MVP” and helping them get to “We are a company”.
